1341740.name: Askold: Path of the Shadow
1341740.description:
Eastern Europe, XIII century.

It has been hard times in the Kingdom. The eldery King is grievous sick and his sons were killed. However, there is the only one who have succeeded in surviving, but he is still in danger. Claimants for the throne are willing to spread death and destruction just to take power. Askold is one of the very few who have remained loyal to the King and it is up to him to reveal the conspiracy and figure out the harsh truth about what's happening.

Features:
• Stealth. The enemies react to sounds so the area is going to be frisked if they suspect anything. You can distract the guard by throwing a stone or you can lure them by whistling. Thick vegetation and darkness may hide you from the enemy.
• Spacious levels. Explore the area to discover some engrossing locations and new possibilities to achieve the aim.
• Fascinating story. Reveal the collusion, find its members,
get to the truth and determine the fate of the Kingdom.
• Variety of completing levels. The mission can by solved by different ways. Find and fulfil additional tasks to approach the solution.
